Posts.Title: Brca 1 ... the journey .... chemotherapy and more !

Posts.Content: Hi  I was diagnosed with the brca 1 gene. I decided to get tested as was on a screening programme for ovarian cancer as had strong family history with this. I decided to have my ovaries removed. Then was picked up by breast clinic to be monitered. They pushed for me to have a double mastectomy but at the age I was I decided not to do it. I attended yearly mammograms and last year went on a new screening programme using MRI screening. This years appointment was just after my 50th birthday .  I was recalled and was told that they thought I had dcis. I had a biopsy which confirmed this . Then after many appointments more MRI's I eventually had wide local excision. The result of that was that there was an area of ductal lobular.  I was then sent back for a Lymph node biopsy which at last some good news was negative ! So I get told, brilliant you are clear BUT as I am a brca carrier you now need  Chemotherapy/ radiotherapy and tablets or chemotherapy and a double mastectomy and tablets !!! My dielma is still ongoing as now have to decide  the next part of this journey ! But I know my life will never be quite the same again x
